Package com.eventApp.Service

package com.eventApp.Service
Service package containing business logic for the CampusConnect system.

This package contains service classes that implement the core business logic and orchestrate operations between the UI layer and data access layer. Services handle complex workflows, validation, and data transformation.

<h3>Key Service Classes:</h3>
  • UserService - User management and authentication services
  • StudentService - Student-specific operations and event browsing
  • AdminService - Administrative functions and reporting
  • ClubService - Club management workflows
  • ClubApprovalService - Club approval workflow management
  • ClubMemberService - Club membership services
  • EventService - Event management and approval workflows
  • EventRegistrationService - Event registration processing

Service classes encapsulate business rules, perform validation, and coordinate between multiple DAOs when necessary.

Since:
1.0

    Service class managing operations related to clubs, events, and club members.
    EventRegistrationService
    Service class for managing event registration operations.
    EventService
    Service class to manage event approval workflows and event navigation.
    StudentService
    Service class for student-related operations in the CampusConnect system.
    UserService
